name: The Hallway (Ellie Samson)
description:
The Hallway is a quick little escape room... or escape hallway I guess, is a hallway technically a room? Anyway, The Hallway shouldn't take more than 5 minutes to complete. Please let me know if you get stuck somehow, and I can give you a hint.

This was made for the extra credits game jam.

PS. I ran out of time for sound effects at the end, so it's a little sparse.

PPS. Also follow me on Twitter! https://twitter.com/Toestee
